meanings.definition: The act of making something or someone appear or be influenced by the East or Asian culture.
meanings.sent1: The orientalization of the restaurant's decor included bamboo decorations and paper lanterns.
meanings.sent2: She studied the orientalization of Western fashion trends in her cultural studies class.
meanings.sent3: The orientalization of the office space with cherry blossom wallpaper brought a touch of tranquility.
meanings.sent4: Her orientalization of the traditional dance routine added a unique flair to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The orientalization of the garden with bonsai trees created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The process of adopting or imitating characteristics or styles associated with the Orient.
meanings.sent1: The orientalization of the cuisine involved using traditional spices and cooking techniques.
meanings.sent2: His artwork showed a clear influence of orientalization with its intricate patterns and designs.
meanings.sent3: The orientalization of his wardrobe with silk shirts and embroidered jackets was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her writing style underwent an orientalization, incorporating poetic elements and symbolism.
meanings.sent5: The orientalization of the music festival brought in performers from various Asian countries.
